title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 139.5 - Increases for other employees with comparable qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 139.5 - Increases for other employees with comparable qualifications

State Regulations
(a) When a person
outside State service is appointed under this Part, the salaries of incumbent

State employees serving in the same title in the same geographical area or
location and having qualifications determined by the Director of Classification
and Compensation to be equivalent to those of the person appointed shall be
increased by such amount as may be necessary to equal the rate of compensation
of the person appointed, effective on the date of such appointment. (b) In connection with his consideration of a
request for an appointment under this Part, the Director of Classification and

Compensation shall determine which incumbent State employees in the same title
in the same geographical area or location are eligible for an increase in
salary. (c) Such determination of
the Director of Classification and Compensation shall be subject to the
approval of the Director of the Budget. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 9

139.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
